text: Merlin Edward FikeU.S. MOVES TO BROADEN ITS CASE AGAINST TEAMSTER By BEN A. FRANKLIN, SPECIAL TO THE NEW YORK TIMES Published: November 4, 1982 (February 5, 1925 - February 19, 2018) was an American politician. He was the 24th Lieutenant Governor of Nevada from 1967 to 1971. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Lieutenant Governors of Nevada Category:Nevada Republicans
title: Edward Fike
